review_data.title: Da Corona bedingt alle Restaurants

review_data.title: Huge delays and wrong food delivered
review_data.content: This delivery service is a true mess. Delivery times indicated are completely wrong (multiply at least by two) and when they finally arrive it turns out they deliver the wrong food. Quality of food is medium, very unprofessional, unfriendly and just a big dissapointment.

review_data.title: Fine Pasta

review_data.title: Good value
review_data.content: Dieci served me a good meal (decent quality) very quickly. It was a nice alternative to the higher priced options nearby. If you are looking for a quick pizza or pasta meal, this is a good option.

review_data.title: Nice shop for reasonably priced Pasta
